# Brief Bio
> I am a graduate student at the University of Chicago pursuing a PhD in<br> Biophysics. I did my undergraduate studies at the University of Illinois<br>
at Urbana-Champaign where I studied Physics. I am passionate about <br>
using my quantitative background to solve problems in genomics,<br> 
ecology, and evolutionary biology. I am also interested in developing<br> workflows for scientific reproducibility.
